expanded_text: {name} {emoji} National: {national} {typee_str}: {typee} {ab_str}: {ability} {evo_text} Games data Gender: {gender} Base friendship: {base_friendship} EV yield: {ev_yield} Catch rate: {catch_rate} Growth rate: {growth_rate} Egg groups: {egg_group} Egg cycles: {egg_cycles} About Pokémon Species: {species} Height: {height} Weight: {weight} Name origin: {name_origin} Other lang: {other_lang} Base stats: {base_stats}{legend}
start_message: ⚡️ Yo, I'm POKEDEX 🥳, a bot made by @tech_sav_bots. My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot. He's teaching me some commands, for now I learned these: /start: you just used it 🙃 /data PokemonName: Get information about that Pokémon /usage: Get current VGC usage on Pokémon Showdown /addcode YourFC: Add your Friend Code in my database /mycode: Show your FC /newraid PokemonName: Find partners for a new Raid /faq: FAQ ❓ /about: Informations about me 🤩
error1: ⚡️ Zzrrt! My trainer's teaching me many things, but I still can't read in thought. Use this syntax: /data pokemonname ex.: /data Rotom
results: I traveled to 8 regions with my trainer but I have never heard of such a Pokémon 🧐 However, I can find the 3 closest Pokémon to what you told me Here are the results ⚡️
about: ⚡️ Zzt-zzz! Yo, I'm Jenny 🥳, a bot made by @SILVER_KING.
limit: ⚡️⚡️😵⚡️😵 ZZZZZZRTTT 😵⚡️⚡️😵⚡️ Oh Arceus, do you want to drive me crazy? Well don't do it anymore, there are no Pokémon with more than 25 characters in the name
nomatch: Write in a language understandable to humans (and Pokémon)
incomplete_fc_error: 🤨 Ehm, okay, but give me your Friend Code. Use this syntax: /addcode 1234-5678-9012
fc_error: 🤨 This is not a valid Friend Code. Use this syntax: /addcode 1234-5678-9012
fc_add:
Friend Code correctly added to the group list ✅
{}: {}
fc_update:
Friend code and name updated correctly ✅
{}: {}
new_raid_error: 🥳 Oh cool another raid! Mmm, what is the Pokemon? Use this syntax: /newraid PokémonName
not_creator: Only the creator of the Raid can use this button
not_player: Only raid participants can see the password
not_available: ⚡️ This is a Raid command! Solrock's Cosmic Power won't let you to capture that Gigamax, so search partners in Telegram groups. Add this bot in a group and type /newraid PokemonName
no_fcs: 😮 No Friend Codes? FCs are used next to your name in the /newraid command. It can be useful 😉
no_fc: 😮 Oh, it looks like you haven't registered your Friend Code. Use this syntax: /addcode 1234-5678-9012
not_admin: You cannot use this command because you are not an admin
added:
⚡️ Yooo. Thanks for adding me, I'm PokeDex. My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot, so I can give you a lot of informations about the Pokemon world! These are my commands: 
 
/start: Command list 
/data PokemonName: Get information about that Pokémon 
/usage: Get current VGC usage on Pokémon Showdown 
/addcode YourFC: Add your Friend Code in my database 
/mycode: Show your FC 
/newraid PokemonName: Find partners for a new Raid 
/faq: FAQ ❓
/about: Informations about me 🤩
faq: ❓ FAQ Q: What is PokeDex? A: A BOT made by @SILVER_KING,
